attributes.action: Implementing classes that allow students to be more knowledged about the world
attributes.additional_details: Schools need to teach more applicable classes, such as resume writing, interviewing, career courses, Life Skills, Job helping, Mortgages, Money Spending-finances, Social Media, Jobs skills, Bulling.
attributes.background: Our generation is changing,my opinion the world is getting worse. Young people are drinking,smoking and doing all kinds of drugs. Kids, teens and college students aren't being taught enough about life and what's going on around the world. They need to learn about life not the  Pythagoras theorem
